scripts.scln: npm install npm -g && npm cache clean
scripts.chkupdate: npm i -g npm-check-updates && ncu -u && npm i --save
scripts.srv: gulp clean && gulp bundle && gulp trust-dev-cert && gulp serve
scripts.bsrv: npm run build && npm run gtrust-this && npm run gserve-this && npm run exit
scripts.nwp: yo @microsoft/sharepoint --skip-install false --solution-name akuminaMenu --framework react --component-type webpart --component-name akuminaMenu  --component-description akuminaMenu description --environment spo --skip-feature-deployment false
scripts.ne: yo @microsoft/sharepoint --skip-install false --solution-name brandingHeaderFooter --framework react --component-type extension --extension-type ApplicationCustomizer --component-name brandingHeaderFooter  --component-description brandingHeaderFooter description --environment spo --skip-feature-deployment false
